=================
NEWS for lazr.uri
=================

1.0.3 (2012-01-18)
==================

- Add compatibility with Python 3 (Thomas Kluyver).

1.0.1 (2009-06-01)
==================

- Eliminate dependency on setuptools_bzr so sdists do not bring bzr ini, among
  others.

1.0 (2009-03-23)
================

- Initial release on PyPI
